column5: my wife found this, I don't want it but some of you guys might  http://www.wagjag.com/deal/oakville/lake-simcoe-outfitters-limited-1385442  for those who haven't used wagjag, we have quite a few times and they are reputable and legit
That is a good deal!!.. I have used wag jag as well with good results..
good deal. weekday might be tough to make, to bad no weekend

Has anyone used Lucky's Sons? Sounds like a good deal but I'd want to know more about the operator before I put my money up.  I used Tim Hale's a couple of times last winter and was very pleased with the service, the huts, and the fishing.
I think I might pick one up to keep the kids busy over the holidays. Thanks Chris and Chris's wife!
this year there is a weeks holidays in the new year so about a 50/50 chance huts will be on cooks bay
